column4: 9 Ways to Take Cortex Agents to Production

column10: 10 Tips for Taking Your Cortex Agent from Demo to Production | Send It Ep. 1
column11: Getting a Cortex Agent demo working is easy—getting it production-ready is another story. We cover practical lessons for external use: writing orchestration instructions that route queries to the right tools, crafting response instructions that match your brand, designing semantic models that work, and configuring Cortex Search for accuracy. Part 1 of the Send It series.

column9: Scoping & success criteria, descriptions (most important!), verified queries, metrics & filters, custom instructions, Cortex Search for fuzzy matching, common pitfalls
column10: Semantic Views That Actually Work: Best Practices for Snowflake Intelligence | Send It Ep. 2
column11: Your semantic view works in the demo. But will it survive real users? We cover the practices that separate POCs from production: starting small with clear success criteria, writing descriptions that actually help the LLM, adding verified queries for accuracy, using metrics and filters, custom instructions done right, and the common pitfalls that trip teams up. Part 2 of the Send It series.
